Articles.Content:
I have a contract of new probe in a specific orbit. I have constructed a new probe with octo probe, a antena and many batteries.

But not detect the new probe. The checks in orbit and stability are positive. The probe have power and the antenna transmits data.

I used a craft saved and modified. The modification and launch is after of the contract.

What's the error?

Edited April 15, 2015 by marioquartz
Without seeing any screenshots of your satellite and its orbit I guess it's moving in the opposite direction the contract asked for.

http://imgur.com/a/RM3gz

Aqui he puesto las imagenes

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Contract#Satellite_delivery

According to the wiki you need a real power source like solar panels. Only having batteries won't work.
